website_summaries.verdict: Nice big handles on this parachute make it easy for kids to handle and great for play.
pros: The wind gets under this parachute easily
Strong enough to sit on top
Good price for family fun or for schools and daycares
cons: Works best for groups of four or five kids
If you have a larger group, this diameter may be too small

customer_reviews.title: A plan 10 years in the making!
customer_reviews.text: My master plan of having five kids and fulfilling my dream of having parachute day whenever I wanted came true the day this bad boy arrived. Suck it to all the gym teachers who would only bust out this magnificent playing device ONE DAY A YEAR. Satisfaction is mine!
customer_reviews.author: Chris&racheal

customer_reviews.title: good but not great
customer_reviews.text: durability and sturdiness are more of a 3.5. I thought the 12-foot parachute was plenty for six kids, but it wasn't, was just too small. The material seemed kind of thin and although it did not rip, it felt maybe too thin. Only used this once and tossed. For a one time use, it works well but that's up to you. If you want one of these so that you can bring the parachute up and you can run under to the parachute and sit to make a parachute, then definitely go bigger!
customer_reviews.author: Dang.10

customer_reviews.title: Living my childhood gym class dreams!
customer_reviews.text: I teach fitness classes for a group of moms with their babies and I bought this parachute for them to do exercises with their kids- this fits the bill perfectly! Pros: It is sturdy material The handles are sewn on well and well spaced apart. It’s a good lightweight material that isn’t to heavy for kids or working out Cons: It’s hard to put back into the bag that it came in, it is almost impossible to fit the entire thing back into the bag. I can get the majority of it in but not all of it into the bag! Overall a great and fun product!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Old school fun for a new generation
customer_reviews.text: Great fun. Arrived quickly. It is nice having a little zippered case for the parachute. The handles were securely fastened and the fabric durable. It held up surprisingly well at a kids birthday party. Kids and adults usd it to “make popcorn” with rubber balls, create bubbles with kids underneath, and play other games.
customer_reviews.author: CSJ

customer_reviews.title: Trampoline shade alternative
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 12 foot version to use as a shade covering for a 15 foot trampoline with a safety net. It worked out great. The trampoline has 6 poles for the net and I just alternated putting bungee cords on every other parachute handle to attach the item to the top. Its a great colorful addition helping to keep the trampoline shaded. I have not taken it down after about a month and it has held up with no damage to the handles or rest of the parachute. The bungees however needed to be replaced after been eaten up by the desert sun. This item also held up with heavy winds and rain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I complain about everything except for this product 🤗
customer_reviews.text: I’m not going to lie when I open this package I was concerned over the quality, the photos made it seem so much more thick HOWEVER this thing is a beast. We have tossed balls on it, water balloons, tried tossing children (didn’t work), we’ve used this for flag football, and I have seen some of the older kids tie it around their waists while multiple children held on for dear life while being drug around the grassy yard. It’s survived a lot of abuse in the 3 days that we have had it but it is staying together strong!
customer_reviews.author: Your mom

customer_reviews.title: 12ft is bigger than you think! But so colorful!
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely, colorful parachute. Read the sizing before buying - it’s huge! Too big for my two children and I to play with which was my intent (I had seen smaller ones), but that said we lay it out and have picnics on it. So the size comes in handy there. If you’re petite like I am folding this is a big hassle, but it can be done! Great for a group not so much for a small homeschool.
customer_reviews.author: ER

customer_reviews.title: Bright, large and lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Large and amazing! I don’t know what people mean when they give this negative reviews but it’s perfect for the price. Larger than I expected which is nice. I have three little girls (ages 2, 4 and 6) and no one has gotten hurt or slipped while using this. We have sat under it, ran under it, ran over it and it’s great. It comes with a nice pouch to keep the parachute together
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Pros. ⬇️ Machine washable. Easy grip handles. Vibrant colors. Fun and classic product. Durable. Cons. ⬇️ No cons found. ———————— The pros outweigh the cons. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alex the Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Great for Recess!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my preschool class of 3 & 4 year olds and they love it! We've been playing with it for over a month at recess time and it hasn't torn or sustained any damage from some very rambunctious children. I'm glad I got the 12 ft. size because it's perfect for the 6 or 8 children I have to play it.
customer_reviews.author: G. M. Fair

customer_reviews.title: Old Fashion Fun
customer_reviews.text: We used this for a large family gathering. The little ones as well as teenagers loved it. It was a fun activity that the multiple age ranges could do together. The parachute is well made and with adult supervision should last for years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unique and fun!
customer_reviews.text: Our kids love this!!! We use it for several games. We also use it as a floor mat for games where you must sit in a circle, it keeps everyone in place. This is so much fun and a very unique activity that can be used in several ways! Once you figure out how you will find it up it is easy to fit back into the bag it comes in!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany DP

customer_reviews.title: perfect for social distancing at pre-k
customer_reviews.text: I needed an activity for preschool where the kids can social distance. This is perfect! It is strong for some wild 4 year old boys. There isn't any stretch, but I don't think that is a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: LOVED THIS PARACHUTE!
customer_reviews.text: My kids got this parachute for Easter and we had a blast with it! We took it to Grandmas house and all the kids played with it. It was the perfect size to make a bubble to hide in (without needing too many people to help). I was pleased with the quality and happy that I could squish it back into the bag without trouble. Would definitely recommend this parachute!
customer_reviews.author: Rocco & Rachelle Ruggiero

customer_reviews.title: Fun in the Sun
customer_reviews.text: Camp Summer Quest and Intellectual Kids Club had fun using the Sonyabecca Parachute for outdoor fun activities during the summer. We would love to learn about the 100 different games children can play using the parachute. We love to maximize the benefits! "Promotes cooperative group play while helping to build muscles. There are over 100 different games a child can play using these parachutes. Develops perceptual, cognitive, motor and academic skills. A must have item for every child."
customer_reviews.author: Denise M Ford

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I got this to put on top of my daughters trampoline as shade and it does the job. It’s worth the price and is perfect for a 12 foot trampoline cover. We do take it off and play with it as well. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla Padilla

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The whole in the center is too small for a ball to fit through and is mesh, not open. I'm sure it's all for safety, but not what I wanted. Probably should have looked closer at the pictures. It's light. Only used once so far.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Rappe

customer_reviews.title: Great Entertainment
customer_reviews.text: Used it for daughter's 13th birthday party and it was a hit. The material is sturdy and it did it's job. Kids of all ages enjoyed it. Fun for the family and for play dates of all ages.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The size is great for a small class
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use in my elementary music classroom. The size is great for a small class, but the straps started to break and the seams began pulling apart after a few weeks of use. Not very high quality.
customer_reviews.author: burkha

customer_reviews.title: Great for trampoline cover
customer_reviews.text: We use this as a "roof" for our trampoline and it works great! Keeps the trampoline in shade and keeps debris off it and looks so adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Free Advice

customer_reviews.title: Heavier fabric than I anticipated
customer_reviews.text: This was better than I anticpated heavier fabric and the 12 loops are very well sewed, we plan to use this to pull a sled in the snow with wind to our back, hope it works
customer_reviews.author: G. S.

customer_reviews.title: Better than the others we have used!
customer_reviews.text: This parachute is very durable! We took it on a short-term mission trip to Nicaragua, where it was played with by approximately 340 kids in the course of a week. The colors are bold and bright, and the handle straps are quite strong. We will buy several more for next year's trip so that we can leave one in each village.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: colorful, tough
customer_reviews.text: Kids built a twig house and I bought this to use as a cover since it was light enough. It has withstood over a month of rain, wind, and snow, and now the dog likes it for the shade.
customer_reviews.author: S. Pitcher

customer_reviews.title: I was expecting more of the material that was made ...
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting more of the material that was made of real parachutes that really hold air and this was heavier material...not so lightweight but its strong enough to stand up to an active daycare and lots of use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holds up with three boys.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my three grand boys. They are rough, tuff and all boy!! My daughter says it has held up well and they use it to make a fort, cover trampoline and even to cover for shade. Good purchase! Good fun!!
customer_reviews.author: Mattie L.

customer_reviews.title: Use with friends
customer_reviews.text: Kids love these! I got one for my daughter so we can play with it as she loves it in her toddler gymnastics class. Too bad we dont have more friends as it is really not easy to do much with when its just the two of us...
customer_reviews.author: Jackie G

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids parties but small
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was larger for the price. But it’s a great party idea.
customer_reviews.author: R. Ami

customer_reviews.title: Product is not what they advertise
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed, I just recieved This and it's not at all What is advertised. Theres a mesh center and The handles are very cheap. Terrible quality. It even has mold spots on it!!! Do not purchase!! I will upload pictures soon.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Paré

customer_reviews.title: a hit
customer_reviews.text: The kids loved playing with this at easter. It was a bit smaller than I thought but really it is excellent. They tugged and pulled and played very hard with this and it stayed together!
customer_reviews.author: HayBay

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved it! Used it for my sons 3rd birthday ...
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved it! Used it for my sons 3rd birthday & it was a hit. The handles are perfect for there little hands. We did lay it down for a second & when the kids walked on top of it they slipped but that’s not what’s it meant for anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Thompson

customer_reviews.title: They love it, and the handles make it easy for ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this parachute for group therapy with children.They love it, and the handles make it easy for all to hold. It is as big as advertised, and the fabric seems to be a strong nylon fabric. My patients can be pretty tough on things like this and so far it has held up well. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Stubbs

customer_reviews.title: Colorful and Fun
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my five year old daughter's carnival birthday party, and the kids loved it. I'm also going to use it in my creative movement class. The size is perfect for preschool and early primary. The colors are bright and the handles are sturdy. Plus the price is affordable. So much fun!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: So much fun.
customer_reviews.text: This was a cost effective way to have a lot of fun at my son’s birthday party. It’s really well made so I see many years of use without fear of the handles being ripped off with rough play.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: As a child this was one of my favorite games
customer_reviews.text: Although we didn’t get to use it during our family reunion we are planning a huge play date with all the younger ones of the family soon
customer_reviews.author: yolonda

customer_reviews.title: Awesome trampoline shade
customer_reviews.text: Needed a sunshade cover for my 14ft trampoline. This was perfect. I hope it’s durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and fun
customer_reviews.text: Great for making forts and all sorts of kid friendly jazz
customer_reviews.author: MorTork

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Used this for my daughters end of the school year party the kids loved it and we use it now At park outings definitely gets a lot of attention and use. We love it and so do many other people!

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Cute, baught for an activity at my daughters birthday party. Kids loved it!

customer_reviews.title: Happy we got it
customer_reviews.text: This is a very thick, durable material. My kids love playing with their parachute. It has helped with supporting the vocabulary development of my son.

customer_reviews.title: Children love this
customer_reviews.text: Used this for a birthday party and the children went wild! Huge hit!

customer_reviews.title: Chunk some balls in and watch how high they go!
customer_reviews.text: Our five love this! We homeschool, and outside time is our favorite time. This added a ton of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Fun entertainment
customer_reviews.text: I use this for a large group of kids ranging from 18 months to 3 years old. All of the kids get so excited each time we bring this out. It’s a lot of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Laurel S Bruner

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for 11 people. At the end of dance class I let them do it before going to class with the disco light on and they had a blast!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved it! Took it to A musical festival to have fun and it held up. Good quality

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: The first time my family used the parachute, it ripped? I'm so disappointed. The quality is not good. The fun was short lived.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I use it in my music classroom with some rowdy kids, and it's held up!

customer_reviews.title: Deff. Go larger!
customer_reviews.text: Don't really have a stretch to it but kids have a blast with it

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids party
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a toddlers birthday party. We couldn't get the kids out of it. Stores away in a small bag

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter loved it something she can enjoy with her friends.
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved it something she can enjoy with her friends.

customer_reviews.title: Multipurpose fun for all!
customer_reviews.text: The Sonyabecca parachute has brought squeals of delight! After the kids ran in and out of the billowing colors it was turned into a tent. Reading books under the colorful covering captured the kids attention to the stories told.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES parachute time. We got this for his birthday party. Higher quality than I expected for the price!

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This is what it is advertised to be. I use it in my classroom, so I thought it should be better made for that. It seems like it can rip easily. For most people it would work fine. It is a great size!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought this parachute to use as an activity for Bible ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this parachute to use as an activity for Bible school. Very durable and the kids ask to play with it every night .

customer_reviews.title: Fun Fun Fun
customer_reviews.text: This was great. Did its job. Totally took me back to the excitement of gym class in elementary school.

customer_reviews.title: This looks better in person than the picture and for a relatively ...
customer_reviews.text: This looks better in person than the picture and for a relatively inexpensive price definitely fills the bill! I am definitely pleased!

customer_reviews.title: Great for little kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our 3 and 4-year-old class at church for game time. They love it! It has the perfect number of handles for everyone and it is very durable.

customer_reviews.title: Durable and sturdy parachute!
customer_reviews.text: Great value and price for this! These are expensive everywhere you look. It’s very sturdy and durable.

customer_reviews.text: I originally got the 6 foot size but was a little small for my 2 year old granddaughter and her parents. The 12 foot size was much better. My granddaughter just loves it! Very well made.

customer_reviews.text: Bought this months ago and it is holding up wonderfully. Good purchase.

customer_reviews.title: a great buy.
customer_reviews.text: The bag could be a little bigger to get the parachute back in it. Overall, a great buy.

customer_reviews.title: These aren't as good as ones I got before
customer_reviews.text: These aren't as good as ones I got before. I had them for a about a week at our play space and after a week or so of play the handles pulled off. I have sewed them back on and double stitched them. I would say that this product is good for light use but day in and day out with many children pulling on it each way it doesn't hold up like the more expenses parachutes that I brought before from other companies. I thought I would give them a try put with the wear and tear use each day my next purchase will be with another style.
customer_reviews.author: Maryann Martin

customer_reviews.title: grand sons love it.
customer_reviews.text: grand sons love it... it's thin, not what I expected. but the kids have fun... we make a game putting a toy in the middle andf the kids pick 2 colors toy lands on that color gets a point. or whip it up every one under wins out you lose
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: Lifted child, fell when released grip
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality product and the seller is not responsible for this bad review. I negligently used the parachute. A sudden gust lifted my thin 4-yr old and she fell hard upon releasing her grip. My quick tug did not help. It was scary, but she was okay. I relive the scene every night when I go to bed. It could have been so much worse. The fault was completely mine for thinking the parachute was a safe and fun beach toy. I'm sure it is quite safe and fun with more adults in control and if used in an area where there are no strong winds. Use the product wisely. My apologies to the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Miami Guy

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: Stiffer and thicker material than other parachutes I've used in the past. This sounds like a good thing, but it makes stiff-plastic rattling sounds and doesn't lift and flow in the air as beautifully as a softer material. Also it doesn't fit back into the bag after you use it the first time. On the plus side, it looks sturdy, and it has 12 handles for lots of little hands to hold it.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam K.

product_meta.title: Sonyabecca Parachute 12 Foot for Kids with 12 Handles Play Parachute for 8 12 Kids Tent Cooperative Games Birthday Gift
feature_bullets: Waterproof 210T polyester taffeta fabric thicker than 190T
Parachute size: 12-feet diameter, 12 separate handles spaced evenly around for group play(Teach turn-taking and cooperation)
Promotes cooperative group play while helping to build muscles,Encourages cooperative play while building upper-body strength
Reinforced mesh center allows ample airflow
Great at birthday parties and picnics(indoor or outdoor play)
High-quality, durable 210T polyester taffeta fabric with reinforced web handles, Includes carry bag
